name: The Hero's Burden
flavor_text: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all that remains.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
perks.name: SLO-12 Post

perks.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: SLO-21 Post

perks.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: SLO-10 Post

perks.description:
SUROS threat evaluation. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: SPO-57 Front

perks.description:
SUROS holo sights. Medium zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: SPO-28 Front

perks.description:
SUROS lightweight red-dot sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases range
perks.name: SPO-26 Front

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.
perks.name: Slideways

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
perks.name: Zen Moment

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Improves accuracy and stability while continuously holding down the trigger.
perks.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.
perks.name: Tap the Trigger

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector
